name: Artvertising! The Battle of the Dollar Stores
name_original: Artvertising! The Battle of the Dollar Stores
description:
You are a street advertiser, with absolutely no drawing skill, and even less dignity! Walk around in your stupid outfit showing your advert to people on the street to win! But there is another dollar store in town, make sure they dont get more customers than you!

Made for Ludum Dare 44!

This is my first finished Ludum Dare! Thank you for playing, really means a lot!
